_name: Milwaukee M18 FUEL Quik-Lok 3000-21 16 in. 18 V Battery Trimmer and Blower Combo Kit (Battery & Char
What's Included: (1) M18 Fuel Power Head w/ Quik-Lok (2825-20), (1) M18 Fuel Quik-Lok String Trimmer Attachment (49-16-2717), (1) M18 Fuel Blower (2724-20), (1) M18 RedLithium High Output XC8.0Ah Battery (48-11-1880) and (1) M18 and M12 Rapid Charger (48-59-1808)
